33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Umm Malik Al-Bahziyyah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) mentioned Fitnah, such that it was drawing near. She said:"I said: 'O Messenger of Allah! Who is the best of people during it?' He said: 'A man among his livestock, who pays what is due on them, and worships his Lord. And a man clutching a head of his horse, terrified of his enemy, and they terrified oh him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ كَيْفَ يَكُونُ الرَّجُلُ فِي الْفِتْنَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About A Man During The Fitnah
